website_summaries.verdict: This piece attaches directly to the toilet and eliminates legs, which can be a trip hazard in some cases.
pros: Comes with soft, padded handles for comfort
Adjustable width between handles, from 16.5 to 19.5 inches
No legs to get in the way and create a tripping hazard
Lets you pull walker right up to the toilet
cons: Limited width, so be sure to measure space and body width before ordering

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my parent who was out of rehab for 9 days before falling 3 times and having to go back into rehab for a few more months. She came home and this rail was installed on her toilet but the front two bars kept twisting forward and providing no support. No matter what was done to stabilize them, they kept twisting forward and falling off the rim. Now it is too late to return it. Save your $35.00... find a different contraption.
customer_reviews.author: Slippednfell

customer_reviews.title: Read and learn...Not for elongated toilets.
customer_reviews.text: It is very unsafe for our elongated toilet. The bar slips out from under the seat with daily frequency. I did not read the reviews prior to purchase and installed for my spouse who was returning from rehab after a serious fall. This will create another unsafe condition for him. Taking it off for safety sake. The directions were non existent, and the picture on the box was not really helpful. It was a lesson in deductive reasoning.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Parts were misnumbered
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product, but the assembly was confusing because the parts were numbered incorrectly. I got it all together according to the instructions, but when I compared my finished assembly to the picture, I knew something was wrong. according to the instructions, the two parts numbered 1 were supposed to fit together and the two parts numbered two were to fit together. I did that, but the finished assembly looked unsafe and not like the picture. I interchanged the parts, and it has worked well ever since. Be wary of the instructions!
customer_reviews.author: Howard W. Hay

customer_reviews.title: Great Support
customer_reviews.text: I gave this five stars because it does exactly what it is meant too. It provides excellent support and gives the ability to get up safely. Unlike the ones that have two front legs, this one not only anchors under the seat the front part of the arms rest on the bowl itself, to give positive support. The only problem is that the arms that give so much support also really restrict your arm movement. It was so aggravating that we took off one of the arms to allow arm movement. In our case that didn't pose a problem because I've got grab bars mounted to the wall.

It seems very sturdy and she really likes that it doesn't have the legs down to the floor. It's a little less conspicuous than other designs, yet still substantial and sturdy. So, it's great for seniors aging in place who would prefer that their decor not be completely overpowered by the assisted elements designs.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Rails
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. The install was easy, and it's easy to remove the handles if you need to. The handles are sturdy. No wobbling at all.

customer_reviews.title: Foot Reconstruction
customer_reviews.text: Along with the female urinal and raised toilet seat, this was a purchase that made ( and continues to make) my recuperation from major foot surgery so much easier. Very difficult to lift and lower oneself on one leg without support.

product_meta.title: Drive Medical Toilet Safety Rail
product_meta.description: If you suffer from poor balance, arthritis, limited mobility, or injury issues, you know how difficult many everyday activities can be. Don't let something as simple as using the bathroom be one of them! Using the Toilet Safety Rail offers secure assistance when sitting on, or standing up from, the toilet. This unit is assembled easily without tools and mounts to your existing toilet. The padded handles are easy to grip and comfortable to rest your arms on. The handles are also width-adjustable to place them even the most comfortable position for you.
feature_bullets: Comes with soft, padded handles for comfort
Overall Dimensions: 16.25"(L) x 19.5"(W) x 11.5"(H); Weight Capacity: 300 lbs
